titleStmt.title: The seuin seages translatit out of prois in Scottis meter be Iohne Rolland in Dalkeith, with ane moralitie efter euerie doctouris tale, and siclike efter the Emprice Tale, togidder with ane louing and laude to euerie doctour efter his awin tale, [and] ane exclamation and outcrying vpon the empreouris wife efter hir fals contrusit tale
titleStmt.author: Rolland, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Be Iohne Ros, for Henrie Charteris,

notesStmt.note: Loosely based on: The seven sages of Rome.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio regali.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
